description: Try this easy turkey recipe for a fuss-free Christmas dinner - succulent boneless turkey, spiced stuffing and a flavour-packed orange, herb and grain salad.
name: Turkey Roll With Spiced Apple Stuffing & Jewelled Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.45kg Macro free range boneless turkey roll with spiced apple stuffing

recipeInstructions.text: Remove top film from turkey foil tray. Leave turkey in foil tray with foil soaker pad and cover with foil. Bake for 1 hour 15 minutes or until juices run clear when a skewer is inserted into the thickest part, removing foil in the last 30 minutes of cooking time. Remove foil tray from oven, then loosely cover with foil and allow to rest for 10 minutes. Transfer turkey roll to a board. Remove and discard netting. Thinly slice.
Meanwhile, cook pearl barley in a large saucepan of boiling water for 40 minutes or until just tender, adding peas in the last 3 minutes of cooking time. Drain. Rinse under cold water. Drain.
Juice 1 orange and place in a small jug with mustard. Whisk to combine. Gradually add oil, whisking until combined. Season with pepper.

Peel and slice remaining oranges into 5mm-thick rounds. Combine pearl barley mixture with tomato, cucumber, onion, feta, cranberries, pistachios, mint, orange slices and dressing in a large bowl. Divide salad among plates and top with turkey. Serve.
